channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.2

item.title: CVE-2019-0820|2024-08-04T17:58:59.792Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20.net%20framework%204.5.2
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when .NET Framework and .NET Core improperly process RegEx strings, aka '.NET Framework and .NET Core Denial of Service Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-0980, CVE-2019-0981.

item.title: CVE-2019-0657|2024-08-04T17:51:27.244Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20.net%20framework%204.5.2
item.description: A vulnerability exists in certain .Net Framework API's and Visual Studio in the way they parse URL's, aka '.NET Framework and Visual Studio Spoofing Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-1113|2024-08-04T18:06:31.789Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20.net%20framework%204.5.2
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in .NET software when the software fails to check the source markup of a file.An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the current user, aka '.NET Framework Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0981|2024-08-04T18:06:30.853Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20.net%20framework%204.5.2
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when .NET Framework or .NET Core improperly handle web requests, aka '.Net Framework and .Net Core Denial of Service Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-0820, CVE-2019-0980.

item.title: CVE-2019-0864|2024-08-04T17:58:59.561Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20.net%20framework%204.5.2
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when .NET Framework improperly handles objects in heap memory, aka '.NET Framework Denial of Service Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-1142|2024-08-04T18:06:31.813Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20.net%20framework%204.5.2
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) allows file creation in arbitrary locations, aka '.NET Framework Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0613|2024-08-04T17:51:27.247Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20.net%20framework%204.5.2
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in .NET Framework and Visual Studio software when the software fails to check the source markup of a file.An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the current user, aka '.NET Framework and Visual Studio Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0980|2024-08-04T18:06:30.801Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20.net%20framework%204.5.2
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when .NET Framework or .NET Core improperly handle web requests, aka '.Net Framework and .Net Core Denial of Service Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-0820, CVE-2019-0981.

item.title: CVE-2019-1083|2024-08-04T18:06:31.516Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20.net%20framework%204.5.2
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when Microsoft Common Object Runtime Library improperly handles web requests, aka '.NET Denial of Service Vulnerability'.
